import"./Cart.css" import{cartInfo}from"../../data/cart" const Cart=()=>{ return(
Your Cart Shop
{cartInfo.map(item=>
Title:{item?.title}
Author:{item?.author}
{item?.quantity}
${item?.price*item?.quantity}
)}
Order Summary
Subtotal ${cartInfo.reduce(total,cur)}
) } export default Cart;
